docs.text: mary norton's children's book series , the borrowers , has been made into several below-average television movies .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: so , i wasn't too enthused as i entered the theater for the big-screen debut of the minute clan .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but i was in for a shock , the borrowers is actually a thoroughly delightful movie with plenty of good laughs and even some decent special effects .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the lender family is being thrown out of their longtime home .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: their aunt , who owned the property , never left a will .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: now , an unscrupulous lawyer , ocious potter ( john goodman ) plans to demolish the house and replace it with an ultra-modern housing development .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but the lenders are not alone in their house .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: living under the floorboards is a family of borrowers , 4 inch tall people who make their living as scavengers from the human " beans " above .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the clock family of borrowers is as distressed as the lenders , especially once they discover the evil potter actually has a copy of the will which leaves the home to the lenders .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: so it is up to the clocks ( pod ( jim broadbent ) and homily ( celia imrie ) , along with their kids , arrietty ( flora newbigin ) and peagreen ( tom felton ) ) to recover the will and save the household .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but when potter learns of the tiny people , he enlists the skills of exterminator jeff ( mark williams ) to kill off the clan .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: there's plenty of attention to detail in the borrowers , especially in the furnishings of the clock family house , made out of lost board game parts and credit cards .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the background details are nearly as rich as the entertaining story .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the various predicaments of the clock family are clever and thrilling .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: based on an original story , the screenwriters did a good job at imagining all the potential and unusual perils that could exist for a 4-inch tall person .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: as the villain , john goodman's performance veers on the edge of being over-the-top .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but his performance suits the role well , and he does very well in the film's many slapstick moments .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: with a nearly seamless mix of oversized sets , bluescreen shots and cgi , the special effects in the borrowers are very well done .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: there are a few times when you can spot the effects at work , but none of them are so jarring that you lose the suspension of disbelief .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: hopefully the borrowers will surpass the curse of being labeled a children-only movie , for it is surprisingly entertaining and fun to watch .
docs.label: positive
